en.content: One of the guards nods to you as you shuffle past. It is an effort to maintain this half-pace when your instincts tell you to run. But you keep it up until you are on the eastern road. Then you discard the disguise in a hole filled with mud.

text.content: You may check-mark the small box beside the Disguise skill.

zh.content: 你拖着脚走过去的时候，一个守卫对你点点头。你的本能要你赶快逃离，保持这种缓慢的步伐相当费力。但你一直没有加速，直到走上东边的盘山路，才将身上的伪装丢进了烂泥坑。

text.content: 你可以在「乔装」技能左边的小方框里打勾。
